name: Deer!
description:
Deer! is a small action platformer which was initially a birthday gift. However after the positive feedback and support, I decided to publish it online for anyone to play. This is my first full game and I hope it will be to an enjoyable experience.

Play as a deer, like any other deer, who wakes up in the middle of the night after hearing a loud crash. Out of curiousity he decides to investigate the sound only to find out an adventure awaits him.

FEATURES:

  • 3 Areas which you can explore in any order, creating 6 possible paths.
  • 4 Unique boss battles.
  • 4 Impactful powerups to collect.
  • 7 Skins to unlock.
  • 1 Secret ending to find.

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow Keys for movement.
  • Z / Space to jump.
  • X to attack.
  • C to throw.
